lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First up, we have a birthday today, we have my wonderful wife, Marisha. It's her birthday today! Happy birthday! (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you, thank you. Thank you to my mother who birthed me. She should really be the one who's getting thanked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, she really should.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still alive, mom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Reenact it for us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll leave that to Laura in a couple months.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Happy birthday.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thanks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next up, we have our two sponsors this evening. First--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, two!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I only prepared one. What's happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm doing the second one. You're fine. But our first sponsor for the evening is our returning friends at D&D Beyond. Sam?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (laughter continues)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Number two: wit and tact.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, what what what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wit and tact. And the number one thing being added to the gunslinger class: knives.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you, Sam. You guys can use the gunslinger fighter archetype as well as the new feat that goes along with it; that's on there as well. Which anyone can take to learn firearms, be better at firearms, even if you're not a gunslinger, so check that out on the app. Thank you guys at D&D Beyond for being awesome, and you for supporting them and us. Of course, our second sponsor for tonight, returning, our fun friends at Obsidian with Pillars of Eternity 2: Deadfire, which is finally out!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I know, it's so exciting. It's so good, it's so pretty, it sounds so good, it plays so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's really good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was the best response.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can move my guy now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I was there when he got that text, we just went (sputtering laughing). Oh my god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I looked it up on Google first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm so excited, I'm so glad people enjoy it, and so glad we can be a part of it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I played today and I just got my first dose of kaiju-god Taliesin, not regular-god Taliesin, kaiju-god Taliesin. It's good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't gotten there yet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura's character and Marisha's character in my party are starting to flirt and I'm like (nervous sound). I don't know how I feel about that. Of course, I made Gilmore. Marisha's character was flirting with me at first and I was like, "Nah, I got to shut this down, Gilmore's not interested."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughter) That's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At least you two are getting together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just waiting for the other guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I get enough of this in real life. Happy birthday. Also, we are heading back to GenCon, guys! Our tickets went on sale earlier this week for the live show in Indianapolis, you can find it on Ticketmaster. The official GenCon panel is sold out, but keep an eye on the GenCon website as tickets that are relinquished may become available as it goes on. They keep cycling through and as things become available, they'll update it, so keep an eye. We'll try and update you as soon as we hear anything beyond that. But holy shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If there are balcony seats for the live show, do not be afraid of them, because that balcony crew is raucous. Just being in that room while the live madness is going on is something to behold, so even if it's the back, if you want to go, go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It was a really fun group in the audience last time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to hide some stuff up there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll hide some stuff.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Why does it smell so funky back here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Why is there silly string coming out of the balcony?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll have more information soon about the scheduling for my fireside chat, as well as the production crew Reddit AMA, and Marisha's Honey Heist soon, so stay tuned.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need to start planning. Oh man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't forget Twitch Prime. (singing) If you have Amazon Prime you can connect it on your Twitch and subscribe to a channel for free, there you go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was a good jingle, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Talks Machina is every Tuesday at 7:00pm Pacific, where our fantastic Brian W. Foster hosts our sit down chat with members of the cast. This last week apparently was off the chain between Ashley and Marisha.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When everyone cries from laughing, it's a good night, apparently.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You face planted on the couch.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've never seen Foster sprout tears like that. That was amazing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You know you've got him when he has projectile tears. It seems opposite of what should be happening.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A special shout out to our friend, PulloutKing, from that episode.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: PulloutKing, thanks for the laughs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We have new d20s restocked?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're not new, but older d20s

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They're used d20s.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm pretty sure they're the special edition ones. I haven't looked at the store, they're the red set, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rare ones.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The ones that were available at our live shows before are in the store.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Laura, would you consider selling used dice that end up in the jail too often? Just offload some of that shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think the store can handle that many.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think if the dice know that they could go to a kinder, gentler home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think I may have enough dice to go to-- one for each and every critter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (squeaking)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're like barnacles!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Next charity drive we have you could auction a few.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Charity drive?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was like: barnacles! She already said that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Guys, the birthday girl is trying to talk.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry, never mind, it's passed. No, I was thinking you could auction them off for charity next time, next charity drive.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I believe that's the last of our announcements of the evening.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit. A fucking troll, you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are up first. You're pulled into the center and announced as The Mighty Nein's final round. Knowing the Stubborn Stock is watching from behind the distant doorways that lead into the central arena, you all scattered about the sands as the sun begins to get close to dusk, shouting out your various plans and then abandoning them last minute. You found places as these heaping, heavy thuds start quaking the ground in arrival before the door swings open. Out from behind it, roaring, a frenzied, angry hill giant, complete with pierced thorns jammed into each side of the body to drive it to a point of absolute anger and fury, comes bashing into the center of the arena, knocks over one of the large pillars, and this is where we begin. I need everyone to roll initiative.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's try and talk to it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just wear him down.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, let's try and talk to him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Almost a natural 20. Almost a 20!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's mildly adequate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sobbing) No, far too calm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 to ten?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which one of you wants to go first?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I should take it because for now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Molly'll take it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Make your life a little easier because I can keep disadvantage for your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight. What'd you roll?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Six. The fun buns!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Brought it back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, friends. It finishes slamming the large pillar into the ground and wields its giant club over one shoulder, its other hand reaching out for something and glancing over the field to see what its quarry is. Nott, you're up first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is the giant in melee? Would I get sneak attack damage or no? He's not engaged with anybody right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think I shifted it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he is not currently engaged.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, then I will shriek and I will run towards Beau, full sprint.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Full sprint ahead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, just right in it already. We're just right in it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, guys, this finally came in today.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's north, east, west, south.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you know where the north is, so you can use that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up. That's so cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Which way's north, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The people who do Campaign Coins make that now. Our friend, Deven Rue, who did our map for the show, she's the one who designed it. I've been waiting for it to come in. That's a point for you guys, if you ever want to shout directions at me of where you want to run, that's helpful.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You ran, full sprint towards Jester.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That thing can see me, I'm scared. I'm scared, guys! I'm going to fire my crossbow. Ooh, it's a two, it misses. I'm super scared.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It arcs off, you hear this distant (yelp) in the audience way away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to say, what was the number? Because that thing's got to have a low AC. What's the actual number?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, probably. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's got thick skin, I think.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's a pretty hardy physicality even if it's a broad target to hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I will run back the way I came.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Same place you were before?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, like behind Yasha, behind that pillar over there, that wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You said that's north?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is north here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Towards you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I see this giant behemoth and I start backing up to go west around the stone, under my breath singing: We are the Mighty Nein, the Mighty Nein, the Mighty Nein. And fire off a Fire Bolt as I sneak behind it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're darting around the side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, that is no good. That is a 13.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 just hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, not too hard to hit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 13 just hits, good to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a big target but it's pretty hardy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One point of fire damage. It hits and goes (splat). It's less of a Fire Bolt and more of a fire (fizzle). You see there's a patch on its rather furry belly that no longer has hair. It's very glaring.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to know. Jester, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you so badly want to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I mean, I want to so bad. I want to use my Spiritual Weapon!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Then use it!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, well, I will. I'm going to hold my symbol in my hand and do like this because I've seen Caleb do fancy things, and then I'm going to make it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where would you like to place it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right above his face!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) 30 is where you can make it appear.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Really close to his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me see what the range is on it. What's the range on the spell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm looking. 60!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60! Yeah, you can do it, right over.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Directly in front of his face, flat side facing him, and then just poof!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll for attack, go for it. As Jester releases her grip, this giant, heavy-looking but gorgeous glittering lollipop apparates out of the air, streaking down towards the goblin's face. Not the goblin, the ogre's-- giant's face. It's been a week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 hits, roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That slipped out of my hand. It doesn't count if it slips out of your hand. Ten points of damage! That's my bonus. For my actual thing, can I do a cantrip?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, you can.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! I'm going to Sacred Flame him! He's got to roll dexterity over 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled a 14, but has minus one dex.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Look at you, you're a killer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm a monster! Eight! Radiant damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wunderbar

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. The spiritual weapon's right here, on his face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's blinded now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Now it's the giant's turn. After being slammed in the face with this lollipop and the flames, is like (angry grunting). Ducks out of the way as it slams down on its head, grabs the side of the pillar, which breaks. The pillar, as it fell over, shattered into four or five pieces, grabs and picks up a single piece. The only one that it paid attention to right now is the one that lit its stomach on fire. It takes this thing and lobs it in your direction.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm behind the stone pressed to the back of it though, presently, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have cover. It's three-quarters cover. What's your armor class, currently?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It is at 14 at the moment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That adds plus five to your AC, so it's 19 on this attack. That's still a 21 to hit though, so it still hits you. 13 plus eight, sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well bring it on, here we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this chunk of the pillar goes flying across the arena towards you, it hits the top of the wall, which breaks, and a good foot and a half section of it, shatters as it slams into your chest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did it do, it did to 19? I can do a reaction, can't I?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Shield.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right! There you go. As you see it slam into the wall above you and go swinging, you throw up the shield and all of a sudden there's a spark of arcane energy as it gets deflected inches off of the top of Caleb's head before slamming into the side of the actual tournament arena, hitting the stone, causing it to crack, and people in the front area (gasp).

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did he roll?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Still hits. Because that only gets me up to 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were 19 because you had three-quarters cover, because you were behind the wall. You had 14 plus five because you were behind--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right at that point, it stops and turns and sees, out of the corner of its eye, Fjord hiding behind the wall. That's going to be its turn. Molly, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Turn into water!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (blubbing sounds) Surprise, bitches!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm up. How dumb do I feel like being?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like I'm already sweating.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I forgot to go to the bathroom. I'm wiggling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it's turned towards Fjord, then I'm going to run around to the opposite side of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, to there? Is it for flanking bonus?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For flanking bonus. I'm going to take two slices into his leg.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two shots in his leg!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See, I didn't do it, and then you just went ahead and did it. I'm working so hard not to do it. What's the flanking bonus, by the way?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We've used it occasionally, but it works against you guys as well. If you manage to get directly across from a creature with an ally in melee, you get advantage on the attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, so this is advantage on the attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You were ranged last campaign so it didn't come into play very often.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here we are. That's a 25 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I assume I don't get the extra bonus for radiant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he's not undead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (counting) Eight points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight points of damage for the first strike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Then the next one is a natural 20! That's 14 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first strike you carve up alongside its blubbery, thick belly that's flipping over this piece of cloth that it has matted around its midsection. As you cut through, it buckles a little bit on that one side of the leg and you use that moment to cut behind its thigh, right down below where the Achilles tendon is. As you cut across, blood spatters across the sand and (yelling).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, I'm holding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to use a legendary action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A legendary?! He's legendary?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's a frenzied solo, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's a frenzied solo? What does that mean?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to go ahead and use his Furious Smash.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is he going to attack me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going to attack, yeah, for slashing him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm definitely using Blood Maledict then, at full use. That was not good, that was bad. All right, that's all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so he has disadvantage on the attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, and the next one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's still a 13 plus eight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you slam and slice into the back of the leg, he angrily turns back and swings down towards you and his eyes go black. There's a brief shake, it's still a massive club and you try to move out of the way but it's too fast, slamming onto you, knocking you onto the ground. Your wind is knocked out of you and your whole world goes dazed and white for a moment. This is going to be 26 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow! Fuck! Yes! Oh man!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You wanted to.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I underestimated the amount of damage he would do to us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a really good damage roll. It reactively slams into Molly with the club. As the dust settles, Molly is not moving on the ground, probably pushed about an inch or two into the dirt and sand. There's a crater where the head of the club had impacted, and Molly is not moving.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That really hurt, Charlie!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: His name is Charlie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I feel like this has changed the plan that I had.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Her plan was to hit Molly. It was a weird plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He has disadvantage on his next attack as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fjord, I feel like I should get up there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just saying, this is a last man standing kind of thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're the only one there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's okay. Think of the team!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to throw a throwing star.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to throw a throwing star? Okay, go ahead.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No wait, I only get 1d4, right? It's just a d4 plus my bonus?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 1d4 times two, plus your bonus.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (counting) Ten damage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, ten damage!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Way too happy about that ten damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't get another one, right? It's just one action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because unarmed attack, it's for the outside, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, and I'm going to move.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You throw one of these spindly jagged star darts on the side. You throw it through the air and it sinks into its stomach. You don't even see where it impacted except for a small red line where it's beginning to bleed from where it carved into its belly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hit him! Then that's it, that's my turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're going to stay there?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm going to stay there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That finishes Beau's turn, Fjord, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm going to use my bonus action to cast Hexblade's Curse on this giant. Hyuck Hyuck! I'm going to summon my Wastehunter falchion, two-handed, and I'm going to cut into his thigh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't your Hex still up from the last game, too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. It was up until the second round and then that was it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also does that mean that his reaction has been burned by the legendary action? Is the legendary action a separate thing from--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Legendary actions are different from reactions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just checking.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. As the large falchion appears, curved and jagged, you see this splash of seawater across the side of the giant as its eyes are now set back on Fjord. At this point, the curse sets in, the blood spatters on the ground begin to come up into these black forms and adhere to his legs.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 13 points of damage plus two for the Hexblade's Curse.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15, nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With my speed, I'm going to run to the north as far as 30 will carry me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to hit you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I know, he's going to hit me next turn anyway.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That makes it a 13.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Armor class 15!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear the (booming) from behind as it slams into the ground. The earth leaves your foot for a second and you land again. You make your way to the edge. Well done, that ends your turn. That brings us to Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I make it over east? Let's go east, near his butt. How far can I get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hit him in his butt!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to hit him in the arse with the Magician's Judge. Reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Reckless? Go for it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 15 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does that mean he's going to get advantage on you now?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But wait, you get to dispel magic!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh shit, that's so bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Double ones.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they really? Double unos?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Double unos. Five points of damage!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you go rushing by, you weren't paying attention for the last impact, and you see out of the corner your eye Molly in the ground, jammed in and unconscious, bleeding out, and that's just enough, being not in an enraged state, to viscerally affect you and shakes you just enough for you to swing the blade. It hits the leg, but it wasn't enough actual impact to carve into the flesh.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn, Yasha. Nott, you're up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sighs) Do we heal, or do we get this guy?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't heal. Hit him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I mean Molly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fuck Molly!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll clock around the corner and fire off a shot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He has potentially three rounds until he dies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I love Molly, but fuck.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 20 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. You can roll damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He is adjacent to Yasha, so it is sneak attack damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ew, terrible.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god! What's with these rolls!?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're going to die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't say it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're going to live.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nine points of damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not as convincing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hey it adds up, guys. It's cool. As you duck around the corner, you release the bolt. It sinks into the chest area and looks around in the direction trying to find you. You still have 20 feet of movement.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You don't have Healing Word or anything anymore?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm not a--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nobody has.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not a rogue thing, unfortunately.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So casual, that's a good--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does that double my dice?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus that's 16 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, okay, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first one hit, and he starts growling, and looks right in your direction. You go (screams), fire a second one that goes right into one of its eyes and starts roaring. It gets caught right up inside. It doesn't quite pierce the eyeball, but it gets up into the socket.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (groans) That would suck so hard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's scratching at its face angrily.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good thing he's already frenzied.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then movement to clock right back around that corner of the--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, of the structure. Yeah, right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's your turn, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was considering going out there, but I'm not going to do it. I'm going to bend around the side and fire off another Fire Bolt at it. At Charlie. That is a 12 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, as he pulls back to grasp the face, the Fire Bolt goes wide past where the head previously was.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to use my movement to back up behind that column.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That would put you about there. That ends your turn, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. Molly, I'll get you as soon as he moves. Okay? So that he doesn't hit me. Okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (humming)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (strained) I'm dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to move Spiritual Weapon around, and I'm going to use this side. I'm going to smack him right in his funny bone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As the hand is grasping at where it got shot in the eye, it goes right for the back of the elbow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! That hits. Then 1d8 plus four. That's cocked. Yeah! 12 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 12 points of damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it hits, (impact) (pained groan) He's shaking the hand as it's going numb. The one eye is half shut. Going (pained groans).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: While he's shaking it off, I'm going to use my bonus action to Toll the Dead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You mean your action. Because you already used your bonus action.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to use my action to Toll the Dead!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was thinking about you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's going to have to roll a wisdom of 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom of 14. Natural 19, sorry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (farcical Czech accent) Two wild and crazy clerics.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bullshit. So he saw me. I'm going to jump down behind, north side. Northwest side, right in the corner there. I'm going to go (small squeak) and try to not get hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. It's now the giant's turn. As Yasha has just torn into the side, it's going to turn back to you and is going to double club attack you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has advantage on each.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's so true.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because she did Reckless.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because I did Reckless like a ding-dong.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So every attack against you is--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I'm dumb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first one is a 25.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well that definitely hits. I'm probably going to be unconscious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20, okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The first hit is--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know why I did Reckless. I'm learning, I should have waited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 points of damage, bludgeoning damage, from the first hit. (whack) You put your hands up, and you put the blade up to catch it, it slams into it and pulls the shoulder out of the socket and pushes you down into the dirt. As you push off, the club goes up once more and then (whack).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 23 was not the critical.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not the critical?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was not the critical.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She could be perma-dead right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Am I perma-dead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 43 points of damage.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How many?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's your total?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your max?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's got 40 something hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to go negative your max score.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which you do not do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Which you don't do.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So you're just unconscious.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just unconscious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just super-duper unconscious.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was pretty close, I think.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Is that right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whoa.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're just unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the second slam, Yasha partially deflects the first impact and then vanishes in the second one. Right there next to Molly, as the dust clears, you see Yasha, unmoving, her legs up in the air, as the rest of her torso is pushed down into the dirt, and the rest of the ground is covered over, where you can see the back of her shoulders, and the back of her head, and the rest of it is dust settling. She's not moving either.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. You came close to perma-death.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, but not. That almost--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughs) J-E-L-L-O!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm watching people get squashed in front of me. Freaking kill box.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Were you still big, too?

lines.name: LIAM, ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a quick thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think at this point-- yeah, because you're the one who shot it twice in the eye, and it saw you duck behind. (counting)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Stick and move.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's my thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as it steps over the wall. "Tiny thing!" After it smashes Yasha, it doesn't even care anymore and there's a little bit of foam at the corner of the mouth. The blood's trailing down its face from where the bolt entered. That's going to end the giant's turn. Molly, you're up. Molly? Molly.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tal.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Molly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Molly, make a death saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I don't have to. I get shocked from my-- the chest. The heart locket sparks and--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What, you're back up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He bought that locket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are the effects of the locket again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are the effects of the locket again?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ready for this? It's really cool.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Full HP.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No. When you wear this pendant, you stabilize whenever you are dying at the start of your turn. In addition, whenever you roll hit dice to regain hit points, the number of hit points--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. So you stabilize. You're still unconscious.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm unconscious, but I'm breathing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you're not bleeding out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm just (deep breath).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There you go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yasha, however--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau, your turn.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's looking at Nott pretty hard?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. He's ready to smash the little goblin.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, Beau is going to run and flank with Nott over here onto also the northwest side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Over there? Flanking would be on the opposite side.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have to be on the opposite side.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, you'll get advantage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I want to go in front of him, where I can get his attention. The northwest side.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I'm going to point at his dick, and I'm going to go: Tiny thing! Then for my action, I'm going to take the dodge action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so your bonus action is to say "Tiny thing."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your bonus action is to say "Tiny thing" towards his dick.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I say: Tiny thing! You tiny thing!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an intimidation check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To insult his penis size?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, that is exactly what you're doing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You have to intimidate his dick.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That didn't--

lines.name: MATT, LAURA
lines.text: It landed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Neither were good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems to think you're agreeing with him with regards to Nott. "I know! Tiny thing!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So I didn't get his attention?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're in the middle of the field and you see both Yasha and Molly crushed into the ground. This little lollipop is (flittering) in the air behind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lovely. Yeah, I'm going to use Eldritch Blast. Shoot across the arena, 120 feet. Try and hit him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You move into the space here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see him over the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a 16 plus six, 22.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit. Go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is 12 plus two, 14 points of Eldritch Blast damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nice! That's a good hit. (impact) Off the side of the shoulder. You can watch where the section, where the skin used to be is now exposed muscle. Where it's burned off, the outer layer of the body.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I use the rest of my speed to move behind the column, so that I'm hiding behind the column?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was that with the Hex?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With the additional Hex damage, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hex damage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was with the additional damage from the--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With the additional d6, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends Fjord's turn. Yasha, I need you to make a death saving throw.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. Do I add anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A seven.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a fail. You failed your first death saving throw.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (gasps) Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of Yasha's turn, the giant is going to use his legendary action. He has one legendary action. Trying to do a club attack against you, Nott.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He has only one legendary action for the whole fight?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once every round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 19. What's your armor class?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry. I should have been more explicit about his insulting his penis size.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yikes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it slams down, it hits you, and pushes you into the wall. You're flattened against the stone which quakes. On the opposite side of it, it cracks and (stones scattering) off the back. You hear this squeak sound as Nott is crushed between the club and the wall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll kill him! Not Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It didn't work.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have to hit the confirm button.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it. Okay, that's not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will look up at the giant man who just hit me and I will take out a tiny piece of pastry and let it crumble to the ground and look up at him with fear in my voice say: Why don't-- (sighs) why don't goblins eat court jesters? Because they taste funny.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks very confused in the middle of his foaming frenzy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Behind the wall I start laughing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Jester?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will cast Tasha's Hideous Laughter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, shit. (laughs) What's the save on that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But what is it? Is it wisdom?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a natural 17 minus one, 16.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why isn't this working?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: He's rolling well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's rolling really well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm rolling really well. I'm so sorry, guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I please get the changes to take? Yes, okay. Okay, that sucks. I will bonus action disengage!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yay! Run away really far.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Towards Caleb, to the north and if I can get behind that pillar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't group!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't group up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Other side, possibly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you wanted to go around that way, you could.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that ends your turn. Caleb, you're up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a long shot, but I have no way of damaging him. I'm going to pull out some sand out of my pocket and mutter a few arcane words and trail it in front of me and cast Sleep back behind him here so it does not touch Beauregard.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll your 5d8.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it and tell me what the total is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23? You watch as the large giant, (groans) (slower groan).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It cracks and tilts to the side. Catches him (grunts). Falls to both knees and eventually hits the ground. This loud, heavy snore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, shit!

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Do we win?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's just unconscious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but does that mean we win? He's on the ground!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You shout this out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Huh?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're shouting this out as this is happening?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we win?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're all waiting for a moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go heal Yasha!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we have to wait, it's like turns.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No one's called the match yet.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fuck!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go heal Yasha!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's my turn now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is your turn, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're going round by round?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't touch the giant.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Any movement, Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I will start moving towards Molly and Yasha as far as I can get. I call out, medium volume, not to the crowd but to my friends: That wasn't even supposed to work.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You did good, Sandman.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jester, you're up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run over to Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (counting) You can't quite get there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. Could I have reached Molly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could have reached Molly, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, then I'll go to Molly first. Sorry, Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, actually if you were here, you could have gotten to there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could have gotten to Yasha? Okay, then I'm going to-- because she's dying. I'm going to use Cure Wounds on her. My last spell, y'all. That is 1d8.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's all right, you're going to wake up, and you're going to fucking go apeshit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten points of healing for you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I add that here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you're up! Then for my bonus action, I'm going to send my Spiritual-- oh, no.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can do whatever you want.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I can't-- if I touch him, he wakes up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, don't touch him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can get it over there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to bring my Spiritual Weapon over to him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can move it 20 feet there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can move it 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the range is 60 feet, but as a bonus action it moves 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I see, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's why I was like, get it closer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next, the giant's turn. It stays unconscious for the duration until something hits it. Yeah, so it's a minute.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Until we touch it, so we need to get in a Goodfellas circle around it to decide who's going to beat the shit out of him, and don't touch it before that moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have a whole minute?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb says. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Potentially, guys, here, figure out what your plan is until someone touches it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can heal Molly while that's going on, then.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to give Molly a healing potion.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He doesn't roll to wake up or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, he doesn't. He stabilizes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to move back by where Fjord is right now, behind that column.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me and you take the head, maybe we can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Moving which one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Stand me by Fjord, to the north.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to take a healing potion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 2d4, I think I roll it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Does she roll the healing potion if I take it, or do I roll it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't matter who rolls it, really.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, because I was curious if my locket gives me-- does it count as my hit dice or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, healing potion isn't hit dice. Hit dice is only when you're taking a short rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's good. Seven plus two, so nine points of healing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you, Jester.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're welcome, I'm sorry it's kind of a weak thing, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I give her an awkward side hug.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Thank you. I give you a big waist hug back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to crawl behind there, and at the very least I can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Behind where?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: To the west, behind that rock right there. I can, at the very least, keep trying to give him disadvantage on at least one attack.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to go northeast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where, like over here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anybody else?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yasha and I are going to flank his head.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'll form the head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're going here, and Yasha's going here, is that what you're doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we want to both try and get him in the head.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to put points down on his--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, you can't both go for the head, if you're flanking. Either you can both get by the head--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I'm saying. We flank his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh I see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry. I used poor language. We're both by his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Then I'll walk around the other side of the pillar so I get a good clean shot. Am I within 30 feet? I want to be within 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Within 30 feet, you would be there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (crossbow loading) Ready to go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's taking the first shot?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then as soon as his eyes start to flutter open, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoever hits big hit first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or also, because he'll get the one legendary, but other than that, it's whatever we can get the fullest round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoever can do the most damage with one attack should go first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Who's attacking first?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who's going first?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like you could do the most damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do it! Go, Beau!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay. I look at Yasha and I'll go down first. Right after me. Okay, ready? I'm going to aim right for his other eye socket, the other one that Nott hit, and come down right in the middle, try and gore his head out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for a roll. It's a melee attack, you have advantage because he's unconscious.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's an auto-crit, because he's unconscious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Auto-crit!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's with your staff.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god, it's a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Aw. Two damage, plus--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus four, so six damage. That sucks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that is painful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you slam down, it hits right off the ocular socket, and skids off the skull, (growl) the eye shoots open, the other one still swollen from the shot earlier, opens as well. (roaring)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I take my bonus action and Three Stooges style, go poke, right in his eye. That's a natural 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still get advantage because he's prone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, let me see if I get that crit. No, 18 though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Damn it, that would be great. Crit eye poke!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: God, a one again. Five damage. Lot of crappy damage rolls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Poof, right in the eye. (roaring) The eye closes instinctually, and the arms begin to flail, as it's trying to--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are we allowed to attack, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because that's the end of Beau's turn, now it's Fjord's turn.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of Beau's turn, it's going to go ahead and use its recovered legendary action to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you run away before he can get an opportunity of attack on you?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Technically he hasn't had a-- oh, no, he did, because it's a whole round back, never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's been a number of rounds.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm working every bloody angle I can think of.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We weren't holding our action for when they-- I guess we never said it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You didn't declare it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, fuck. I thought it was implied, we were just waiting for it to wake up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought you said, who's going to attack first, we were going to Goodfellas it. We were going to do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, well, from now on if you're going to hold your action, please specify that. Those who were nearby needed to hold an action, that would be you, Molly.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I then move and try and jump over him so I then flank him with Yasha? Can I use my movement to get to the other side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, because if you guys were holding your action to the trigger of you attacking, then they're all going before you do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Cool. Take your turns.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to go ahead and say, (demonic voice) You got hit in the face with a piece of lollipop! I'm going to attempt to do four psychic damage and give him--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a 15. 16 minus one, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (sigh) Will you roll under 15 eventually? Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know, I've been rolling really fucking well tonight, I'm sorry!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You gave him the die.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's also a DC 10, but yeah. All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 23 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have disadvantage because he's prone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 22 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Still hits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is 13 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 13 points of damage? How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trying not to hit Yasha or Beau, I would love the bolt to go through its belly as far as it can go.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM
lines.text: Right in the belly button.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hit something major, and it's starting to bleed out and it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did not expect that to happen!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Takes a swing, and at this point there's already blood draining out, and the swing goes wide, hits the ground, falls back onto its butt, and proceeds to slowly go back to sleep forever.

lines.name: LAURA, TRAVIS
lines.text: Forever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (whisper) Shh. Go to sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we win yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point there's a pause, this awkward quiet before the entire audience at once goes (cheering).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use my Thaumaturgy to start chanting, Nott, Nott, Nott, Nott!

lines.name: ALLSAM
lines.text: (chanting) Nott, Nott, Nott, Nott!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, don't draw any attention to me, no, don't see me, no!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I look over at Caleb and say; No big deal, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pull my hood further down over my face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cheers continue as the large goliath steps out again with his tattoos and spiked armor, and he goes, "There we have it, the third round completion of The Mighty Nein! But one more fight "stands. Congratulations!" You guys are then led over to the holding area off to the side, as you pass your friends of the Stubborn Stock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I grab my Spiritual Weapon as we're leaving and drag the giant lollipop out of the arena with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Leaving this large groove in the sand behind you. As you guys walk by, the team begins to-- there's this slow motion, like opposing little league baseball teams passing each other.

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA, LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Good game.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Darrow, who gives this, "Not too bad, well played." Gives a smile as he continues past. You see the dwarven crossbow ranger gives a grin with his big scruffy poof beard. There's the half-elf woman with two warhammers that she's spinning on the leather straps on the end. You see this really fucking old guy. This wrinkly, old prospector-looking eyes through these wrinkled slits. (hoarse greeting)

lines.name: TRAVIS, MARISHA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Fucking old.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have no other way to describe him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Old as balls.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is his hair long or short?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His hair's long past his shoulders, but it's super bald skullet on top. You see there's a tattooed halfling, who's got his chin in the air, grin and give you a show, and there's the human archer that has a longbow that's at the ready. All of them walk by, all six of them, into the center of the arena.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As we walk by, can I try to untie the old guy's shoelaces?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a sleight of hand check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughs) He does not notice. It's not a shoelace, unfortunately. There's a boot lace. You untie it. You don't know how much of an effect it will have.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just killed that old man. Well done, Nott.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They looked pretty cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They did.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think we looked that cool?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I liked how the archer was walking around ready, all the time, maybe we should do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Nott, always keep your crossbow loaded.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But how will I drink?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a wyvern. A wyvern that's been prevented flight, and comes barreling straight to the center. They immediately go into a formation to accept the creature as it goes. Darrow rushes up with his battleaxe and starts cutting into the creature. You see this divine energy flicker off the arc as it slams into the side of this, this flash of radiant energy off of his battleaxe. He pulls away, his long black ponytail swishing behind from the arc of the blow. As he ducks out of the way, the tail swings and he ducks underneath it. The archer pulls back an arrow and the arrow flashes bright blue-green energy before it strikes and bursts into arcane energy on the side of this wyvern. It turns around and grabs the dwarf by the head and begins to thrash around with him in its jaws, throwing him about ten feet, he skids to the ground, falls unconscious in the first round.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just like you, Molly!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The old armored guy pulls up a symbol from his chest and begins to chant in the wrong direction, before the halfling grabs him and spins him this way, and he goes, "Right, ha!" and continues his chants. Another weapon, a Spiritual Weapon appears and apparates, but it looks like a large club of stone that begins to slam. The wyvern spins around and its tail manages to impact the belly of the old guy as he finishes his chant, and you watch him go limp and fall to the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Guys, I feel like we got the better end of the deal on this draw. Kind of glad I'm not fighting this thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The halfling with the tattoos tears his shirt down and exposes all these tattoos on his chest, and he slaps them and begins to chant in a Haka-style chant. He begins to (chanting). As he's doing this chant, all of his allies that are standing begin to get revved up, before he rushes in and pulls a blade and strikes at the wyvern, carving into its side.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yasha, you should do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We should rip off these guys' aesthetic completely.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just like the idea of the formation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, formations are cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The cleric comes to consciousness and then brings through a quick casting of a spell off to the side, the-- what's the other one there, it was the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was the old guy the cleric?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The old guy's the one that went down, and-- actually, no, the dwarf you thought was down actually gets back up. He wasn't unconscious, just knocked really hard. He gets up, makes sure the cleric is up. The cleric heals some people around them and they begin to curl around it. They continue to strike and back and forth, the audience is breathless at moments. The wyvern jumps up on top of one of the walls, its stinger spins around and jams into Darrow. You see Darrow, the leader, takes a blow to the chest, and he goes unconscious on the ground before the wyvern pounces on him and starts tearing into the body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's eating him!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The halfling, who's still continuing this chant, rushes forward, leaps onto its back and begins carving at the back of its neck. The elderly cleric begins approaching, still chanting in his mind and he's unleashing heal spells, and occasionally throwing a bolt of energy, an electrical divine bolt of energy strikes the side of the wyvern. The dwarven ranger unleashes strike after strike of the crossbow and the wyvern's hitting whatever comes near it. Two more of the members go unconscious and it gets down to just three on their side, before they manage to continue to stab into its side. Like a long-running bull fighting ring, both sides are exhausted at this point. Three of the six are down and the wyvern's still standing. Darrow has gotten back up and is breathing hard. He backs around the side and they've all surrounded the wyvern who's feeling cornered at this point, blood pouring from different wounds on its body. It gives another loud shriek. It turns around towards the elderly cleric and charges him and with a giant sweep of its jaw, sends him about ten, 15 feet in the air before he lands and rolls, unconscious on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does the shoe fall off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's two left. The boot does dislodge and arc an additional ten feet before resting away from--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Catching on the power line.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Knock down the shoes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With that, the two standing members which are Darrow and the halfling both charge in. The halfling gives a pat on Darrow's shoulder and shouts out a phrase in a language you don't understand. Darrow seems to embolden his muscles, rushes in for a strike and carves down with his battleaxe into the back of the neck after it slammed into the cleric. As the blade sinks in about five or six inches, the large battle cry that it gave shrinks back into this weird withering screech. As it whips around, Darrow pulls his battleaxe out and backs away a few steps. The wyvern falls to its knees and with that Darrow spins the battleaxe in his hands and carves off the rest of its head with two, three, four strikes before it collapses. With that (cheering).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I use Thaumaturgy to say in the audience, "The Mighty Nein are cooler still."

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (chuckles) The cheers are deafening at this point. The gates open in front of you as the emcee walks out once more and goes, "An incredible fight by the Stubborn Stock! Bring out our other "winners, The Mighty Nein!" The audience goes into loud cheers. You guys step out into the arena. The same crew's coming out and dragging the body of the wyvern off down into the depths of where it was originally unleashed and the doors close behind. The clerics rush out and bring to consciousness the other members of the Stubborn Stock. They all eventually rise, beaten and bruised and as winded as a lot of you look. They give you a look as you approach and it's a "well done" smile. Wordless, but a nod of respect. Then you to the right side of Jermai Kull, them to the left. "Raise your arms! For today on this Harvest Close, you are the victors!" The crowd goes crazy once more, flowers and bits of rice grain and all sorts of things are thrown into the center of the ring in part of the celebration.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Throw some money instead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the gates on the opposite side opens up and a group of seven individuals begin to approach in various robes. You recognize a lot of them as people that were in the lounge earlier before you entered this actual arena. They're carrying a small chest of iron and dark set wood and as they place it on the ground, they begin to pull out sacks of money. They're presenting you the divided prize. That's three rounds for the group and each round was 200 gold. That's 600 gold that you guys get to divide and then the final pot was 2000 divided amongst the two teams. An additional 1000 to your team. So 1600 gold.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not bad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the money's delivered to you, you acquire your reward. There's a final burst of cheers from the audience and you're escorted back into the holding area where the other groups have already left. They close the doors behind and it seems like the fanfare's over, the attention on you, momentarily, has faded and it's just you guys, the clerics, and the other group, the Stubborn Stock.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you say all the politicians have already left as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Last you saw, they were up in the stands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys just got back to the holding area, taking a breath for yourself.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is there a heal spell in the house? (groan)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clerics?" The clerics say, "We've used most of "them, but I can offer a couple." They come up and they give you a heal. You heal eight hit points.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That helps.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Heal Yasha too, she's really low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You heal ten. Then two other spells are delivered to the opposing side. The other team.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, because they had a lot more people that fell, actually, so they probably need it really bad.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That was very well fought. Impressive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It was very large feet on that gentleman."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But a very tiny dick, as was pointed out by our friend, Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As I heard that from across the way."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Really, he doesn't catch nuance though, so.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's okay."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good to know for next time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Apparently giants do not suffer the same insecurities that most people in this town does."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What happens now? Do we just go home after this or is there some sort of soirée afterwards?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Come!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who is invited to the party?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, the winners, of course."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there free booze?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Most likely."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come on!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I need a drink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He goes, "Stop it!" He puts his arm around her waist and the two walk off together.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dwarf got game.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They're cute together.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's one of them who looks like they're wearing clothing that's a little more exotic than you're familiar with. You do also see, within this area-- let's see here. You see Lawmaster Orentha Stonegrasp, there with her gray, curled hair, the older dwarven Lawmaster of Zadash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, she's the one that we talked to before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Alongside her is Dolan Thrym and two other people you haven't met.

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Dolan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The guy from the--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Our Dolan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they totally visible to us? What are their physical appearance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh the what-- what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The people that are with Dolan, what do they look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh. They both appear to be wearing similar dull gold robes as to what you've seen members of the King's Hall wear. But they're a little more casual. They're not quite as presentory or "in-the-office" mode.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The individuals that are in the more exotic clothing than we're used to, what can we see of them? What do they look like?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, there's two people dressed in merchant garb that you see, the colors and the silks and the billowing pants and the jewellery is very reminiscent of Menagerie Coast where it has a lot of finger chains that attach to rings and it's this very presentory jewelry, that isn't classic European in visual aesthetic. You've seen it around in town where you grew up so you gather these people are from Menagerie Coast folk. The one who looks very exotic has very light linen outfit that is a dull eggshell white, but then has trim that is gold and purple. The pants are a deep blue. Short black hair, dark skin, bright smile, but you don't notice any other cultural touchstones that you have any previous experience with.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have I ever seen an outfit like that before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may have seen things similar to it passing through your town from a distance or from your mom's place of business, but nothing that you would necessarily know. Roll a history check, actually.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She knows her history.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come closer, please, I want to meet all of you." He starts putting hands out to meet you. "What's "your name?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello. I am Yasha.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yasha. Pleasure to meet you. Fantastic performance. You're a mighty warrior. I'm really "impressed."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you very much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. You are?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Molly. Charmed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Molly Charmed. Good, pleasure to meet you."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fantastic. You, miss?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lady Fancypants McGee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's a curious name."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So nice to meet you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pleasure to meet you as well. Pants are rather fancy, well done. You there, little missy?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi. I'm just Pam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pam. Pleasure. Shy. That's okay, that's allowed. What's your name?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Caleb.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Caleb. Pleasure, pleasure to meet you. You are?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you, sir?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fjord. It's been an honor fighting in your Victory Pit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, well, I will tell you, a brilliant display of skill and precisely the kind of "showmanship the fine people of Zadash need right now. I appreciate your being a part of this. It's "well-earned victory and--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Was this person in the conversation I was spying on before?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is the Starosta of Zadash.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Have tensions eased in the city a bit since, you know, the incident?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The incident?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, in the tower with the-- yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, right. Well, we've taken care of that for the time being. Repairs have been made, the "tower's back where it was. The individuals you probably want to talk to about that are over there "in the corner." They were faced away from you when you first entered, but looking out from the far window that leads to the outside, you see two figures faced away, looking outward, holding glasses of wine. It looks to be the two figures you saw when you first entered the ring, Oremid Hass, the headmaster of the Zauber Spire. Or the Halls of Erudition.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then the dude in the white robes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The dude in the white robes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They were the two that were just pointed out to all of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. They were just facing away from you guys. Wyatt Fedar says, "If you want to enquire "the specifics, they'd be the ones to talk to. I will say, I've recently been notified by "Stonegrasp." He points over to the Lawmaster, who's in conversation on the side with her own people. "That you had already completed some dangerous contract work for the city, is that "correct?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's indeed true, yeah. We found ourselves in harm's way. We're always looking for the next bit of adventure to put some coin in our pockets and do the city some good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's fantastic."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We beat a spider.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's the one she mentioned. That thing had been a problem for some time, I hear, so it's "greatly appreciated. You've done twice now, a great service for this city. Well, this evening is "yours to celebrate. Things shifting as they are, we may have need of upstanding and skilled "citizens of the Empire such as yourselves in the near future. Should you be interested, that is."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is everything okay, Starosta? You seem rather stressed. I'm good at spotting these things.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate that. My position here comes with a number of responsibilities so at any given "point in time I'm probably am very visibly stretched, but I'm doing the best I can. I "appreciate that. Where might we contact you, should we be so interested?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, we're frequently at the-- what the name was the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Leaky Tap.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The Leaky Tap. Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Leaky Tap Tavern, okay."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Frequently, not always.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. Sometimes we stay at the Pillow Trove, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sometimes we're out and about.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. Well, good to know. Should we have need of you, we'll know where to come and "find you."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, on the Pillow Trove: you know, sometimes people don't quite know the services we do for the city. Sure would help if we had some sort of slip or badge that would allow us to move more freely, you know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Through the gates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Simon!" Hits the side of the chair and one of the crownsguard comes up, but a more decorated crownsguard. Looks like he holds more status and he goes, "Yes, Starosta?" He looks about and says, "Can we ensure that the rest of your body of "soldiers understand that these fine champions of this year's Harvest Close festival are allowed "entry and exit from our fine Tri-Spires?" He's like, "Yes, sir. We will make sure that the "Crownsguard are aware of The Mighty Nein and their ability to pass in and out unimpeded."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Most gracious of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you so much. What is your name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, I'm Jeremiah. Captain Jeremiah. I'm-- anyway. Well done, well fought." He takes a step back out of the conversation and you get the sense that there's a little bit of a hierarchy there where the Starosta, not meaning to, but there's a very much, "I should not be part of this "conversation," and he steps out of it. "Well. Very well. Look, enjoy your well-earned evening of "revelry as much as you can. I have a sense there are some stressful days ahead so enjoy it. Rest "well." Takes his glass and drinks to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To a better tomorrow!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed, young girl." He turns around and sits up on the couch, and re-engages in conversation with one of his various guests.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He certainly seems stressed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's going to die tomorrow in war.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We all are.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you talking about?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't I tell you guys? There's a war starting tomorrow?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I overheard them. Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She did tell us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all going to die. We should leave now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not going to die. The war is very far away from us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
