lines.text: I can't believe I find myself agreeing with Nott here. We should get out of town while it's still possible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really? We're just starting to climb our way up through this thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You leave the table when you've got the pot. You don't wait for everything to go back to the dealer.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think for a day or two, everyone here is going to be very preoccupied in the city. If there is anything you are thinking of doing, it would be a good time to do it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should steal everything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At some point, they're going to start looking for people to fight this war, and I'm not sure I want to be around for it, because boy they know who we are now.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What I am suggesting is a compromise. Not leaving immediately, but soon.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need time to go back to the Pillow Trove, you guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: DM, can you remind me what time of day it is?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's past dusk now. At this point, nine o'clock in the evening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On past days, has Pumat's place been open this late?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has been.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I still have a giant tapestry over my shoulder.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like to think you did the entire fight with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I put it down before the fight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anyone else pick up on those two individuals over in the corner?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, he pointed them out, we should go talk to them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They look familiar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What should we say?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want me to do the talking?

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I was kidding.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you should. You weren't with us the night that all this went down, so they would not suspect you of anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's actually true.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fjord, can you come-- We're all going to go, right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sure. Yeah. I'll join you. Jester?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You want me to come, too?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I actually think maybe it should be her and Beau, because they won't recognize her, and human faces tend to blend into the crowd, whereas we do not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I can listen to the Starosta.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am already hanging out by the door to this place. I left 30 seconds ago.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, but I was actually kidding.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You'll be great, Yasha.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just ask them about what happened the other night and the Crick that they killed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Remember how we talked about getting you out in the world more, and then you said you didn't want to, but then we said you're going to have to do it anyway?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I know, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is those times.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (sighs) Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, let's go make asses out of ourselves!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She'll take care of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then ask them--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What do we need from them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Names. Information.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are they worried about?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where are they going to fight? Are they going to roll out people?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ask them how they fly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! Why don't you just act like you know more than you do? Like, (gruff voice) Whoa, I hear war's coming tomorrow. What about that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we're going to help the city, the more we know, the better.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not even start making vague promises. Just be yourself and you'll be fine. Just be anybody but yourself and you'll be fine. It's going to be great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What was that about making promises?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: As they start walking over, I'm going to wide flank to the left--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, so who's going where?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Me and Yasha are going to go talk to the wizards.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beau and Yasha are going there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not going to go too?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, these two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh jeez. I'm going to constantly stay within a few feet of the Starosta, but not in like a weird way. I just want to like overhear his conversations and see if he's talking about war and stuff.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd like to flank to the left and keep an eye on the crowd to see if anybody pays attention to two strangers approaching.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It seems that the cluster of merchants that he had originally mentioned are keeping pretty close to the Starosta. They're probably in the business of discussing future transactions and business. You gather probably more on the Starosta making connections in preparation for what's about to transpire.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it really crowded in here? Are there a lot of people?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's about 20 or so people in the chamber. The chamber's maybe about 40 feet by 40 feet. It's fairly packed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to send Frumpkin dancing around people's feet to follow Yasha and Beau, and take a seat in a chair on the side of the room as close to the door as possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find a chair, everyone seems to be standing and conversing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's okay. Fjord's been teaching me how to talk to people.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you want to take the lead?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. I walk up to Orenid Hass. Oremid.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're both faced away and they're looking out. There's a window that's open that leads out into the main Victory Pit and then there's the sky, which is mostly clouds, occasionally you see a break with some stars. They're in the middle of a conversation, but it's hushed.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I grab Yasha behind on the small of her back. I walk her up to the window, and I'm like: Yeah, and there's actually a really great view--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both immediately stop and turn over to look at you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can't even imagine the beauty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right? It's such a great view. Over there is the Cobalt Soul.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pardon me, can we help you?" You glance over, and you can see Oremid Hass, at first glance: squat, maybe five-foot-three, but a wide body, like Wolverine proportions. Very dark, ruddy brown skin with eyes that are black like obsidian that sparkle when you look at them. The hair is very short and curled, and there's this very strongly inset dimple wrinkle when he smiles with teeth that are dull gray in color. There's something not quite human about him, but also very welcoming. As he turns towards you, there's a bit of dust that is loosened from the edges of his ears, and it (air puffing). It's a strange phenomenon. With long reddish-gold robes, his arms are folded in the sleeves where you can't see them. He says, "I apologize, we've taken time away "from the window." The other gentleman turns towards you, and you can see now, very close, an older gentleman, probably 70s or so, skin slightly jaundiced or yellowed in color versus the usual pigmentation here. Bald on top, but longer gray-white hair that goes past the shoulders, the same white and gold robes. He smiles, but he looks like he's not enjoying the pleasantries of the space, but then puts on a face as soon as he notices your arrival and gives a nod. "I recognize "both of you. You were part of this fight ordeal, The Mighty Nein, correct?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We were. I recognize you, too. I feel like we've met before. Maybe at a gala previously?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's possible. I do not recall, but if so, it is good to see you again. I'm sorry."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beau.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Beau, I am Oremid Hass. I am the Headmaster of the Halls of Erudition. This is my compatriot, "Master Trent Ikithon."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Trent Ikithon.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns and goes, "It is a pleasure to meet you. I saw what you did today as well. It was a "very majestic display of skills, quite."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Thank you very much.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Majestic is my middle name. We saw, the other day, you guys fighting off those invaders, that was very impressive. Thank you so much for your service to the city.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oremid goes to raise his hand and Trent goes, "Oh, so you were present during the attack "outside of the Zauber Spire,

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Towers are tall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it was an unfortunate incident that, thankfully, we were present, both of us, to take "care of it before it grew too dangerous."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What were you fighting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That seemed to be assassins sent by the Kryn dynasty, terrible Cricks that had attempted to "steal something that should not fall into their hands."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: The Kryn dynasty, they are from northern Xhorhas?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That is correct." He gives you a look over, like he's inspecting you with a very rapid and very detailed intake of your features, and he goes, "Where are you from, if I might ask?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Abort, abort, abort.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am... from...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where did you grow up?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Xhorhas.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How long have you lived here in the Empire?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Not very long. About, let's see, maybe eight months or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That doesn't look good. No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fascinating."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She travels and has helped--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trent isn't even looking at you. He's completely focused on Yasha.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I travel. I left. (stammers) I chose not to live there anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Why did you leave?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just, you know, it's not a great place to live. It's awful. It's marsh and it's not a comfortable place to live.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw for me real fast.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wisdom saving throw? He just did Zone of Truth on you!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wow, that was cocked.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Super cocked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Super cock!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Seven. Because I have a negative.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're talking, it's weird. He's staring at you, but for a moment you feel like there's an illusion over his mouth and his fingers. They're still not moving, but it's almost like your eyes catch something shifting unseen beneath them. It's almost like you've layered two images over each other for a brief second. Then they're gone, and he goes, "Huh. Well, very happy to have you "fighting on our side."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, I most definitely am. I can assure you I don't stand for anything bad from the Xhorhas and I am here to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wonderful. Maintain that, please."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You and your friends seem to be very helpful, and a lot of help may be needed. Should "you ever stray from that path... It has been a pleasure, Yasha."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, that's me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He reaches out and shakes your hand once more. "I would like very much to talk to you some "time in the future. You're intriguing."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, you see, you have to go through me, because I'm her booker. That's actually a conversation that me and you and the rest of The Mighty Nein can have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You're Cobalt Soul, aren't you?" Oremid goes, "Please, stop this interrogation. I "apologize. My friend is very studious."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I am Cobalt Soul. Yeah. Super proud of the work we're doing over there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have done much great work and have aided us on many occasions."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone at the Cobalt Soul feels the same about you all at the Halls of Erudition.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oremid Hass actually laughs and he goes, (laughs) "Look. I know that there have been "tensions in the past, but, complete honesty, I really appreciate what you do over there."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Anyway, we must be off. The evening has grown late. Isn't that correct?" Trent goes, "Yes, "that is correct. It's been a pleasure. I look forward to our paths crossing again."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Great. Same here, because this was great conversation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One last question, Oremid. The Cobalt Soul's been talking about moving to the front line. Do you have any idea if we're going to get the same support from the Hall of Erudition? Because I know you're a fan of our work and we're such a mutual fan of yours.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To the front line of what?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Ah, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of our finest will be present at Bladegarden "and beyond. Should things escalate any further, I'm sure a number of our circle will also join "where it's necessary."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Beautiful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have my word and the word of the Assembly."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cobalt Soul's got your back too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But to be clear, do you know what you're fighting?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They both have a knowing look at each other and look back to you. Trent casts forward and says, "We have been studying for quite some time as is the nature of protecting our people here, "yes, but there are still many mysteries beyond the boundaries. Why? Is there something you know that "we don't?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just if you're fighting-- I just wanted to know if you were fighting the Kryn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very much so. They have killed many of our people. The skies to the east darken, and we want "to keep that darkness from spreading. We wish the sun to continue to rise on this empire, and "currently it does not over the Ashkeeper Peaks."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I wish you the best of luck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you. If you're ever near Rexxentrum, find me. I would like to continue this "conversation."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, anyway, a wonderful night to you all. Rest "well. Congratulations and well fought."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: DM, can I ask, is his name Trick-a-tick-a-ting-tong? What was his name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trent Ikithon. I-K-I-T-H-O-N.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I spelled it right!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're welcome.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I ran a half-ikithon once.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Boo!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Where did he say we could meet up?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rexxentrum.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Rexxentrum?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rexxentrum, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Which is where the Soltryce is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Rexxentrum. Soltryce Academy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They exit, and you watch as Oremid, halfway through the room, as he has his arms folded, goes, "Oh my goodness. Look at you!" and gets down and starts going towards Frumpkin and is like, "Well, "how did you get in here?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, he's got a weakness.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He begins reaching for--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hass or Ikithon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Please. I would like to touch on you."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm taking all this in first person.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's remember this for later.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My whiskers!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's all I can take. I get out of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You pull out of it, and you watch as Oremid actually picks up Frumpkin and holds him in his hand and starts petting him like (coos). They both continue to walk towards the exit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I lean forward and look at the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As they exit the chamber, Oremid, outside, goes ahead and sets Frumpkin down and pets his head for a moment. "Go on. Don't get stuck inside." They both leave and exit into the night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That looked like it went well. How bad was it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What information did you glean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, Yasha's super honest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Why? What happened?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Super forthcoming.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I figured it's like one of those things, that if you're going to get caught, you might as well tell the truth because it's easier to remember. I don't know. I panicked.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, did you say anything you didn't want to?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't think so. Did I say anything that was bad?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't think so.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe where you are from and how short a time you have been here.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, I said both of those things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You said both of those things?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, you did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You definitely made it seem like she could be a Xhorhasian spy definitely there to potentially kill them. In fact, I think that's exactly what they thought might have been happening.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, but you also dropped a horse apple in front of them as well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it was kind of great.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What'd she do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She mentioned a little insight on the pending war when no one knows about the pending war.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think they're going to look at you as a good resource. I think that's what you revealed yourself as.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Either that, or they think that I'm a Xhorhasian assassin, and I am not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What the fuck is the Kryn though?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Kryn is the kingdom over there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Kryn.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's the Kryn dynasty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, the Kryn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Kryn is the empress of the drow, you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The green is something else.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm not here. I'm next to Starosta.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's pretty good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is the Starosta still here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Starosta is still here, yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, I'm still there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I was envisioning a big, evil monster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You overhear the gist of most of the conversation, best you can without catching too much attention to yourself. Over the next 20 minutes or so, you catch what amounts to them discussing possible future difficulty in crossing border boundaries between the empire, the Menagerie Coast, and imports. The necessity of them, but having to make sure they go through very stringent processes in doing so, with the promise of coming conflict. He doesn't outright say that they're at war yet, but the Starosta is essentially laying the groundwork for maintaining trade lines through the Wuyun Gorge, across the Cyrios Mountains. Wanting to make sure that the port towns of the Menagerie Coast still have access to get the necessary goods to the empire, not only to maintain their people, but to get them as quickly as possible to the front to the east.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Right, allies.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can sense there's a bit of desperation in his voice. He's generally trying to do the best job he can and feels overwhelmed in the moment and is trying as best he can to cover it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But if there's anything that we need to know, now would be a good time to tell us so that we're not in danger. Are you a Xhorhasian spy come here to do bad things to the empire?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh my god, you've discovered why she's been with my circus all this time, working as a bouncer.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, why are you here then? Why did you flee?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I don't know if that is any of your business at this time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I want to know in case they're going to come try to kill you and kill me by accident.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If they try and kill you to get answers, then, this way, you don't know anything. Then you're really not worth anything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plausible deniability.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plausi-mon-a-mon-a-minity?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plausible demi-ability.

lines.name: LIAM, TALIESIN
lines.text: Sea anemone. Sea anemone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What side are you on?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm on my side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm not on any side, but I do think what we are fighting is something very terrible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You mean what

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In Xhorhas?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Kryn?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. I mean, we heard about them in the north and they're mostly dark elves that settled in a massive ruin that was completely forbidden for us to travel to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did they do bad things to your people?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah. The ones that went there. They do keep their skies dark. It's some kind of dark magic that we don't know of that keeps the sun away. They've enslaved men and beasts and demons under their banner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That sucks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Have you seen the dark skies?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've never been there because it's hard to get there and it's not someplace I would want to go alone.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you know anyone who went?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've heard stories, but never anybody personally.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you interested in going there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I've always been curious. Just to see with my own eyes, but they've done so many bad things that I would want to fight them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think Molly's right. I think Molly and Nott are right. I think they're going to try and start enlisting soldiers here. Are they doing the same where you're from?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: During this whole talking, I look in and see where my cat is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Frumpkin is maybe 20 feet outside the door and is waiting for you guys to exit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay. I tell him to wait there for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we're really going to be pulling out of this city that fast, haha. Maybe we should take advantage of these new badges we have and hit up the Tri-Spires.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Finish the evening off right. I'll honestly say I'd like to get out of here as soon as possible so they don't think we're running from the news. We get out of here before the news hits.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. All at once?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Where do we go?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't care. I'm just happier moving than staying still.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How quickly are you thinking?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If it were just the two of us, I'd say leave tonight, but--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How about 24 hours from now?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: See if we can make it faster, but 24 hours is not terrifying.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Dusk tomorrow.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No later than dusk. I would like to get out before news starts to spread. Before they decide to start locking down the holes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. One more day. Just to get supplies and get ready for the road again.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a fair point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we divide up the money?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I believe that's 228 gold each.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are in the process of finishing this up and people are starting to leave from the lounge area and they're starting to close down, Darrow comes up with his troupe-- they're a ways into their cups-- and he's like, "Friends, before we shove off and probably never meet again, I just "wanted to say it's been an absolute pleasure to get to meet you, to watch you fight, for you to "watch us fight. All the luck in your future endeavors."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Same to you. It was very impressive. Where does fate take you after this night?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, as far as I know, we're probably heading back up to Nogvurot and continuing with "our contract of sitting around and being paid for nothing."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that-- remind me again-- north of here? Northwest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Northeast-ish. East of Rexxentrum. That's where we've been stationed for the past six or "seven months or so. Done a few jobs here and there."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this a contract that keeps on going or is there any set end date for you guys?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, not until they cancel it."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Man, that is rough. We've been hearing little murmurs of action-- what direction is it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: East.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: East of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Like over on the border with Xhorhas?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. Trouble stirring up. You hear anything about that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Other than the fact that there have been incursions and kidnappings and stuff, it's all "been small and localized within the borders, but Bladegarden's there for a reason, and "Talonstadt."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Since you're familiar with that trip back and forth, anything you would recommend us checking out? Just in case we decided to wander for a bit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "(laughter) What are you looking for?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know, a good time, a bit of adventure. Maybe a bit of both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Hm, a good time. To be perfectly honest, if you're looking for wining, dining, and various "nightly pleasures, my faith does not allow for that so I'm a very bad source, but," and he turns around--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think what my friend is talking about is can you recommend any good ways to get into trouble?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. Legal trouble, or illegal trouble?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What you will.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you're going to go illegal, you can actually go just beyond the boundaries of the "Empire to Shadycreek Run. Entire haven for murderers, thieves, and all sorts of strange "people."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe if it's not so gnarly?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Personally, Rexxentrum's got it all."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We hear that. Soltryce Academy is located there as well.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah, that it is."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know anybody that's graduated from that academy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "To me, it's not been too bad."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fair enough. Well, I wish you the best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You as well, my friends. Drink deep. Play hard."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Indeed. Same to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'd like to stop the Starosta before he leaves the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You do notice, as Darrow leaves, he does have a medallion around his neck that, previously, was hidden under his armor. It is the symbol of the Dawnfather.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's the legal thing, after-- oh no, it's not!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Dawnfather's legal here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Dawnfather is legal here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the rest of the folk are exiting out, you guys have basically waited to close down the party. Most of the servants are cleaning up and finishing up the space. The Starosta begins to leave and make his way out there with his companions and they're chatting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I drink all the leftover drinks that people left behind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Classiest. Classy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have limitless alcohol.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: May I have a moment of your time before you leave?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh yeah, of course! Jester-- " No, you told him it was Fancypants.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fancypants, yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: McGee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fancypants McGee."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right, right. Yes-- "

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My friends call me Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Fair enough. What can I do for you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I couldn't help but notice your body posture, for this

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gives a look and goes, "Uh," and looks back and forth between his companions. He goes, "What are you insinuating?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm talking about somebody to talk to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right! Right."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To relieve your mind of your stress!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Genuinely, Jester Fancypants McGee. However, such "is my life-- "

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know you have people that work for you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Maybe in a week. Give me some time. A lot of stuff percolating right now, but Leaky Tap, right?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Or the Pillow Trove. All right, well I may have use of your services soon. Not at the moment, "but soon."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I can help your mind! You just relieve that stress! It's somebody to talk to, it's very helpful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate that. Soon." He is trying desperately to not make the wrong impression to his friends. He darts off with them into the night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are you drinking every random cup or are you pouring them all into one cup?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Suicide or one at a time?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, I'm just finishing the ones that are left behind! It is an atrocity to leave alcohol on a table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a constitution saving throw, Beau.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah! One of those was full of dip spit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fjord's work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Iron stomach Beauregard over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're going to have the shits later.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Probably.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a trash person. I walk over and I take your last drink and drink it and salute.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're a-- You--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh man, you guys, I was really trying to get the Starosta to talk to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, you offered him your services. I would've said yes if a strange psychoanalyst walked up to me and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I am a healer! I'm a really good healer.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you tell him that he has to give you a dollar to engage your services?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I told him-- I didn't give him a price, actually.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: See, that's even shiftier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That means I'm really good, is what that means.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You charge for these services?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not for friends.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispering) I'm actually really shit at giving advice, but don't tell anyone, okay?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't agree. I feel like you would be very good at it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, any time you have any problems, Yasha, you just come to me, okay?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay. I'm maybe showing a little bit of pink on my cheeks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we talking about rolling at the Pillow Trove this evening? Is that what I am picking up on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I need to go by there anyway. How long has it been since we've been in town?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Since you've been in town? It's probably been a week and a half to two weeks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: By this point, my mom has probably got the package here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, by all means, let's stop by there and then let's see if there's a fancy place for us to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have fucking money to burn!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We need some healing potions and things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. I bet there's places in--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We'll go by Pumat's later. It'll be fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We could go to the Silken Terrace!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What is the Silken Terrace?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point now--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Seven, eight, nine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, no, now it's probably about 10:30, 11 o'clock.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Plus, there's always one of those Pumats around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. What's the mission for tonight, though?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tri-Spire. Pillow Trove. Get Jester's package. Get turnt up. Get some healing potions.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, we're getting turnt up before we go to Pumat's?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why not?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you think Pumat is going to be open at two in the morning?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At Ren Faire, the more you drink, the more you spend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do we need to go now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's late.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TALIESIN, LAURA
lines.text: We did a lot today.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, I'm so tired!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's probably because you just drank 15 drinks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lead the way, Jester!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Up early in the morning?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Up early in the m-- Are we staying at the Pillow Trove?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pillow Trove!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you guys divide the money up?

lines.name: TALIESIN, SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What did I get?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And five silver.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone who remains is either pretty tossed or is in the process of closing down their various carts and established places of sale. The Pentamarket is closing. The festival pushed it a little for some establishments. You make your way, walking towards the Tri-Spires, and that's we're going to take our break.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're at a break!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, we're taking a break because it's 8:50.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's still your birthday! (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll be right back. However, we do have our Wyrmwood giveaway. Tonight, we have the quilted maple dice tray. With our leather interior.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, that's really cool!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Danoba will get your information, we will get that sent out to you A.S.A.P., but well done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And thank you, Paul, for getting us all ice cream!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes! We had break ice cream. Nobody tell my trainer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I had the fro-yo, because it's healthier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are leaving the Pentamarket in the late hours of the evening, making your way towards the Tri-Spires. As you approach the outskirts of the outer wall, the gates open, the guards there posted, there are three there waiting. They begin to approach as your troupe begins to arrive. One of them steps up, goes, "Halt please, we've-- Oh, right, please, you may continue."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Very obviously holding and petting my cat and looking at all three of them as we walk by.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of them is the guy that kicked him originally. He's not the one that interfaced with you, but he's standing by the side there, just waiting. He watches you approach as you walk by, and he goes--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Guten abend.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He swallows and doesn't respond. Just looks off in the distance.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Caleb, what did you say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Abend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good night? Hello?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, that's--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Gluten almonds.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have a pleasant evening.

lines.name: MARISHA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Gluten almonds.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Where are we going?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, we're going to the Pillow Trove. I support you, Jester, but I mean--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I support you too in all of your endeavors, Nott.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, then let's go there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys make your way through the streets of the Tri-Spire--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excuse me, apologies. I pull Beau backward by the arm. And-- no. Long enough until we fall back a bit, and wait to see that the group is not paying attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can you get me into that library tomorrow?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I also kind of told Yasha the secret. You and Yasha know the secret.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's not really that much of a secret.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, but the library is a thing that we can do before we leave this city?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. As long as nothing crazy happens, I'm assuming.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am just hoping to look at books. Is that all right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. I know exactly what you want to do. Yeah, should be all right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Good. Great.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What are you looking for, just more spells? Or anything else in particular?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I mean, spells you can find, you know, digging in 1000 year old laboratories. I want to learn. I want what is not readily available to all.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know if that is something that I would be allowed to look at. What kind of clearance do you have?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They're not going to let you see the super secretive weird shit in the back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: History?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, there's tons of history, man. They forced history down my throat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, this is good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, wait though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's two times I've tried to bail out of this conversation.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. Real good at it. Why are you afraid of fire?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Great segue.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Uh. Well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm just saying, I just want to know because I'm going to be taking you around books, and your relationship with fire is, you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you going to set the books on fire?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, are you going to set the books on fire?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to read them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take you in the library if you tell me why you're afraid of fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispering) Oh, manipulation!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One secret traded for another. It's a fair price, I think.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is there anyone around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's the group ahead of you, maybe 15 feet, and you're approaching the exterior of the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm giving Yasha a piggy-back ride.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you know where to find me when you're ready?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you consent to this piggy-back ride?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I have my feet linked so I can monkey piggy-back ride.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's amazing. There's the Zauber Spire, glistening and lit from beneath. Assembled, and no longer akimbo. You guys approach the exterior of the Pillow Trove. There's these steps that ascend to the entryway, the arched door frame, and you enter the beautiful--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll take you to the library as soon as I get my payment. Drinks?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're out in public, and we're in front of a hotel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Inside the hotel has drinks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like that you have a handle on your mug, but you don't use the handle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, it's a little unbalanced. I have to choose if I'm going to commit to the handle, or if I'm going to commit to the cup.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe do the thing you just did.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is not bad.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But the handle gets-- I do the same thing with this cup. I grab it by this the whole time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you make your way into the--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do you do it, Sam?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Pillow Trove, in its beautiful marvel presentation there awaits you as you come into the well-lit interior. There's a number of candles that are hanging on small hooks in the walls, and dangle there, and the flames flicker to light the archway, and the inside. There you see, sitting at the table, going through a stack of parchment, is Madam Luenna, who you had briefly seen before in this beautiful red dress.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She's gorgeous. Hey, that lady, that's who I was trying to look like that night, you remember, when we were at the-- yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well kept, almost bouncy brunette hair, and golden eyes, and she smiles as you enter. "Hello, "how might I help you this evening?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hi, do you remember me? I was here before.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I do remember, yes. Good to see you."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You too. Did you know we just won in the Victory Pit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did not. I did not attend that portion of the festival, but congratulations!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Thank you, we're kind of famous now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That's wonderful."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We think we might stay here tonight, too, because we thought it would be nice for The Pillow Trove to have famous people staying here for you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But of course. Is that a room for each of you?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She's an Instagram model!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It depends on what you want to offer us as the Victories of the Victory Pit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, I'm happy to offer you rooms at the discounted rate of the charging price we give to "it. It's still an establishment."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yes, but we would tell everybody we stayed here all the time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, it doesn't work that way, my dear."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm really bad at persuading people today, apparently.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you want me to try?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm doing a really bad job. I have a package probably here anyway, so I'm going to check on that. I'll let everybody else talk to you about how famous we are now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. How many rooms would you like?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think two will do just fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Two rooms. All right."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: However many can bunk together, I guess.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If I recall correctly, that would put you around four gold.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's it?! Four gold! Do you know how much she wanted to charge me before? I'm going to leave it though, because I am walking away. I'm at the front desk.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Four gold for two rooms?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For each room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll cover the fellas' room. Here's four gold.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Here's four more for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This was her ceding to the Victory Pit victory and return customer price. Jester, what are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to see if my package is here from my mom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a young woman there waiting, who is falling asleep at the desk. "Oh, I'm sorry! I "didn't see you there. Can I help you?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's common.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh. Well, very well done."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a package here, probably.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Name?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jester.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Jester. Hold on just a second." She gets up and walks out of the room. A minute passes. Two minutes pass.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Anything on the desk of value?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On the desk of this woman who has left? There looks to be a small oil lantern set there that's flickering. It's well-made.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nice pen or anything?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it looks like she took it with her.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I keep waiting.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About five minutes pass before she enters with a small parcel under her arm, and goes, "I "believe this is to you, Jester, correct?" It's a small box about that big, it says "Jester" written in nice handwriting on it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yes, that would be the one I'm expecting. Thank you so much!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It came?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It came, I guess! See, I told you my mom is really cool, you guys!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry I doubted you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're all going to be here to see this open, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) It's probably a lot of money, so we should open it up in the rooms.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Very fair.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank you for your help. We'll retire for the evening.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we typically tip when someone--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She does have her hand open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, here. Of course, of course! Here's two gold for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two gold? Jesus!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm very wealthy now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you very much, madam. Have a wonderful night and stay here at The Pillow Trove.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now we don't have to worry about things anymore, you guys!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys head back, the keys are given out to both of you. The madam leads you up to your chambers. On your way up, she goes, "Are there any other services that you will require while you're "staying here this evening to celebrate?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What services are available?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All kinds of services."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Bottle service?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wine can be delivered. Companionship can be provided."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Massage?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What kind of companionship do you have here available?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Ah, well--" You see her trying to find the words for it. She goes, "Likely the best kind of "companionship you can find."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Not the best kind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The best available.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You don't happen to work with the Ruby of the Sea, do you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But we have fine companions here as well, to--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She has the best reputation, you know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "She has a

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester does that too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hmm? Who does that?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lend an ear. Give advice. Ease your mind.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, I do ease people's

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just saying that's how it sounded before, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yasha, if you were to partake of a companion, what kind of companion are you interested in? Is it like a beast type of a thing, or--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Like a tall one or a short one?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know, just one that I-- maybe lots?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe lots?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What color eyes do you like the most? Do you want people with one color eye and the other color eye, like you--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "How about you come and find me when you've decided whether or not?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there like a-- never mind.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jester, shall we?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The madam leaves.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I ask an out-of-character question? As a citizen of the Empire, how much does Caleb already know about the Cobalt folk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The Cobalt Soul? You know of them, in the way that you know of the people at City Hall that keep all the records of buildings and such. You know it exists, everyone knows it's part of the structure, but nobody really pays much attention because it's a place of learning beyond what the usual learning process is. Certain people would.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like the public libraries of today.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right, you're a librarian.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of, yeah. People know it exists, but the few people that really take an interest in it either end up pursuing it, or adjacently to it. Those people end up acquiring more knowledge and end up becoming more prominent in the society. It's almost an unused resource, unfortunately.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Their political affiliation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As with all places of worship in the kingdom, whoever helms those locations-- the High Priest, the High Archivist, whoever they are-- they are appointed by the Crown and work directly for the Empire. All religion here is employed by the Empire at the highest point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So long as there's a Cobalt Soul Scholastic Fair, really.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Scary Stories to Tell in the Dark?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes! I want my pencil set!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's after winter, unfortunately. You have to wait until spring for those to come around again. God, I miss those.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Shit. Everybody got those gifts brought to the room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It felt like a festival inside your school.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it was amazing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do they still have those?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's make one for adults!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guys! Reading's cool! No, legitimately, it is.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Support 826LA! Thank you to those who did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You head to your rooms at the Pillow Trove.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, when we get the money, we should all go out and buy new outfits, and we should go have a feast, and maybe we can buy new clothes for the horses too, because I bet they would really like that.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But you don't need to give us money.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's for everyone! I open up the box that says my name right on it. It says it right here, my name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First off, the package, as you shake it a bit, it has various objects inside of it. It rattles a bit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's not as heavy as I expected it to be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe it's a check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's probably what it is. I have no idea what that is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about eight to ten pounds. As you open the package and unwrap it, it's pretty well wrapped, you open the parcel and on the inside there is a bag of coin about that big there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's probably platinum, because it's lighter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a small bundle that's wrapped with twine, and there's a letter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh! (singing)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Beautiful handwriting.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. She's really amazing. Do you want me to read it out loud?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, of course!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay. "My darling Jester," that's me, "I do so hope your journeys have been safe, "fruitful, and wondrous. I've always wished you to see the beauty of the world around us, and while "the circumstances perhaps were not the most favorable, it has allowed you the freedom to "become your own woman."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's nice!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're on your own now, and while I will always "miss that little girl, I'm equally eager to see the woman you will become. Tensions here are less, "but not absent. Given time, I hope things will vanish into the past, and you may come to see me "once more! Until then, I have included a small trifle, some things to keep you comfortable, "creating, and free. I love you. Your Ruby," my mama, "Marian Lavorre." She doesn't tell many people her real name, you know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Marian? That's a beautiful name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Isn't it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a nice letter.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love my mom so much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It looks like she loves you very much, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's see what she sent us, okay? I open the little package.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The package contains a vial about that big, filled with dark liquid. You shake it there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I recognize it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. She keeps it, usually, by her materials. It's a bottle of her lavender perfume.

lines.name: LAURA, SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chanel!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I was going to say! Wow!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It smells really nice! Everybody really likes this smell!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a red ink, there's a blue ink, there's a green ink, and then two black.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Blue, green, yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Color printer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Magenta, cyan. (laughs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This is so I can keep painting. I used up a lot of the paint that I had at the festival.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hmm?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And 200 gold in the pouch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 200 gold?!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a lot of money! For all of us.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is a really good amount of money. 200 gold is a lot of money, you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you expecting more?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I mean, when we left, you know, I had a lot more than that. But, you know, it's because I'm growing up, and we probably are learning about how to spend money better, so she's teaching me, probably, that 5000 gold is not needed every time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She gave you 5000 gold before?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (panicked exhale) I really thought there was going to be more money in here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you tell her that you were out of money?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I did! I did tell her that!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And this is all she sent?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But you know what, that's totally fine! 200 gold is really generous of her!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe. I don't know your mother, maybe she was testing the postal system. Sending a small amount as a test. You can write back and say, "Got it safely, feel free to send more."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a really good idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe that was it. Because I wouldn't want to send 5000 gold over the mail system. There's people out there who

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (laughter) Whoosh! (imitates dramatic music)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is so easy to defraud the mail.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Plus, 200 gold is a lot of money. That's more than I pretty much have right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It is a lot of money!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's more than we used to make in a year, easily.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a lot to send somebody in a birthday card.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm really sorry about that one time when you were talking about money with me, okay?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The most important thing is that she loves and cares for you, and wants to support you from afar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is really great. She sent my favorite colors. Red and blue and green and black. Those are my favorites to paint with!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Those are the absolute most basic you can have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can mix them. She knew I had a lot of white already on me, so I can make lots of colors.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Mostly paper is white, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, it doesn't work like that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how it works.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we going back out, or are we turning in? Some of us are beat to shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you guys want to split up the 200?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Jester, why don't you keep that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Jester, it's your money.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We just kicked ass and made 200. We'll do it again tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is true. I'm going to put this in a special place, so that we have it in case we need it. Okay?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. The emergency fund.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly. This will be "Mom's Emergency Fund."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sure. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to paint that on the bag. "Mom's Emergency Fund."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's very exciting.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How deep of a sleeper are you?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't know, I feel like after a day like today, pretty fucking deep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cool. We'll find out. I'm going to go downstairs

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. All right, so you head downstairs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to at least need the best masseuse they have who's also willing to do other interesting things. And someone to feed me and talk to me as the entire thing is going on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The madam goes, "Well, I can definitely provide those requests. That sounds like a two "companion request."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would imagine so.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, just so I'm clear: Do you get a full release massage while you're eating a steak or something?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fruit. Don't be crass. That's just weird.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Preference? Male, female, in between?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Surprise me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well. That will run you 20 gold."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I pay it, and you can sleep through it or not, if you like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm just going to be turning my face to the wall.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Welcome back to college, man!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: College roommates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the rest of you are turning in for the evening, to relax. You all eventually get yourselves comfortable. Caleb, you're reading through your book. Then, at the door, (knocking) of the male room, and it opens up. There you see a young man and a young woman both enter, in nice silk robes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, it's in the room?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh yes. Had you not put that together yet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both human.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We got two rooms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, so, who requested the service?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh excellent! Are you on the bed?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not anymore.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I'm going to take the bed, and I'm going to take my full massage and otherwise.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And otherwise?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If you would also like some food, I'm sure they'd be willing to--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They bring in a small platter of grapes, and other fruit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll take an apple and say: Godspeed. I will leave the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Caleb?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I leave the room and actually run downstairs and ask the front desk if they have another room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, of course, another room can be provided."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How much is that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "For your troupe, that would be four gold for a third."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, here's your key. It's two doors down from the one on the left that you originally "purchased with your friends."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it the four ladies in a room?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Occupied.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we hear? Are we next door to this room? Can we hear what's happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, I'm sure at the very least I knock on the door and say; I'm having fruit if anyone wants anything.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled a 14.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I rolled a seven.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I rolled a 16 plus-- Oh, 19?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a one. Are we done taking donations?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Taking donations?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know, for 826? That's all done now, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I think so, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So now they're just straight-up bad.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Man, in context that was weird as fuck! I rolled a 19.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's mostly ridiculous conversation through this whole thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we hear?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All you hear are giggles.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I poke my head out. Do I see Fjord?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see Fjord in the hallway. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Psst.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hey. How you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're in the most expensive hotel in 100 miles and you're in the hallway. That's real fucking funny.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. Molly got a guy and a girl that walked in with food.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You want to come in our room so you're not in the hall?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you have people in there with food?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have Nott and Jester and Jester has pastries.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yasha's in here, too!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We could order room service. You want to come in and order room service?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that sounds fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's do that. We order room service.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: About when this is happening, I pull the wire out of my coat and hold it into my palmed hands and Message to Nott. Nott, will you find an excuse to bring Beauregard and yourself to my room you saw me go into?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Message received.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Huh? Nothing. I didn't say anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You said "Message received."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was practicing a new catchphrase.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's weird.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's why I'm practicing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You should try a different one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I kind of like it. I don't know. Like, you hit someone--

lines.name: SAM, MARISHA
lines.text: Message received!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, that's great. I'm kind of into it!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a little heady.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. You have to unpack in the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Hey, you know what? Did you order the room service yet?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We called down?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think the phone's broken, so maybe me and Beau should go deliver the order downstairs.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. Tell them we want cookies and milk for sure.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: A rat--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh! We didn't eat our rats yet!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, we can get them here, and then save those for another--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, they'll die!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rats are currently back at the Leaky Tap.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, no, you haven't. No, you still have them, you haven't gone back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we toast now?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, yeah. I am pretty hungry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But Yasha likes to cook hers, remember.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You don't like to cook yours?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh, no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nott, that's crazy. I mean, I'll try it, but I feel like it's much-- Do you want me to have them cook it? Have you ever had it cooked?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: With a little salt, little pepper.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if they will cook rats here, though.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Most of the places that charge a lot of money for rooms don't usually cook rats. But they do have other animals that they will cook for you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do they have?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Probably like a cow, or a deer, or an owlbear or something.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How about this: we'll tell them to give us the chef's choice. The special.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The giggling gets louder from the other room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh god. I can't tell who that's coming from.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh god. Come on, let's go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Give me your rat and I'll have them cook it and bring it back for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're spending enough money on this place.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Are you sure you won't take it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I won't eat your rat.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you promise me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do you promise not to kill me in my sleep because you're a Xhorhasian spy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (loud giggling)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If I don't eat your rat, you can't kill me in my sleep because you're a Xhorhasian spy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a (squeak) as you pull it away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Let's go order some food.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way to Caleb's room?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As soon as we get out of the room, I say: I was told to bring you to Caleb. I don't know why.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we go order food first? Then we'll go hit Caleb, because it's going to be, like, 45-60 minutes to deliver it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, we go order food first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you go order food, for the breadth of the evening meals it costs we'll say one gold, five silver for food for everybody.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you guys want to do in the room now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to send a few Messages out. Caleb, what room are you in? Caleb, what room are you in? Caleb, what room?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I eventually catch it, I give Nott the room number.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. He's in room six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way to Caleb's room.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (knocking)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (knocking)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Jesus.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Come in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I brought the monk. Are we discussing some escape plans?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Potentially. You know, we're leaving soon, and Beauregard has an in at one of the bigger libraries in the city and I want to go there before we leave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Excellent, let's go. Tomorrow, right? When they're open.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, but Beauregard has given me a condition. She had some questions for me, and I would like to answer them, but I don't feel right telling her and not telling you, so I would love for you to stay here for a few minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, yes, whatever you want, Caleb. It sounds serious.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Beauregard, may I ask you a question to start?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How do you feel about the Empire?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I mean--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you in favor of how things are going here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not sure what it was for. Seems like a lot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you comfortable with business as usual?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? How do you mean?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you approve of how the Empire is going?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not super invested in the political spectrum, I just don't want any part of it. So no? I think it could be better. No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is she lying to me about being not invested?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, that's up to you if you want to--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As far as I know, yeah, she's being pretty forthright.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have to shout, "Insight check," or--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's up to her whether or not she decides if she needs to or not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Marisha's telling you, Beau is being genuine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Not super invested about how the empire is going?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I think--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Everybody's lying!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have no investment in their success or failure. I think most of them tend to be scumbags who want monetary and influential gain, and I think they treat their poor pretty shitty and they treat their elite pretty great, and I think that's sucky. Yeah, I think they're garbage people, but Molly thinks I'm a garbage person--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Trash person.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry, a trash person. If they're garbage people, I'm their rare cousin, the trash person.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I would like to get if my reading on if that is genuine or not. Yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, so, Liam asking a question, and this is your choice. It's just an idea that popped in my head. Could I request that everybody but Sam and Marisha leave the table?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can we get everybody else but Sam and Marisha to leave?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Bitch! Fine, bitch! I didn't want to listen anyway, bitch!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That means you, too, Matt!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, sure. Well, then!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (yelling)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I watched my father sacrifice a lot to get where he was, and I'm not sure if it was fucking worth it. So the Empire doesn't lean favorably in my spectrum. But I also don't care if they really live or die or whatever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I really want to go to the library tomorrow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This may be a very stupid decision of mine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What does she want from you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Would you be willing to leave with me tomorrow if I asked you to?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just the two of us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But why?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is the secret that valuable?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am going to tell you the story of how I murdered my mother and father.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Another boy and a girl, and--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: From your town?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ja

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How old were you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was young.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's young? Teenager?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Anyway, we went there. I studied for a year. I worked so hard. It came easier to me than the other two, but they were also very accomplished. There were other students from other parts of the Empire there, and a little over a year of learning all they had to impart, I met a man named Trent Ikithon. He became our teacher.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why didn't you say anything earlier?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Earlier when, earlier tonight? Earlier a week ago? What do you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: When we were talking to Trent. You know we were talking to Trent.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: After a year of studying in the main school, Trent handpicked all three of us again, and we left the school proper and went with him to a home out in the countryside where he trained us. It was a good time. We believed in the Empire, we were going to keep it strong. He was cruel. He hurt us a lot. Made us go through extreme circumstances, but we got strong. I also fell in love, but that's another story.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: One of the other students.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. We rose through the ranks and it was the Empire over all, and eventually, he wanted to test our allegiance, so strangers were brought in-- traitors. Disgusting people,

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You were just students?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He made you executioners?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We wanted to be.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Caleb, that's deeply fucked up, you know that, right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. A few months of studying, of a little bit of torture, a little bit of murdering dissidents and traitors and deviants.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then one day your parents are brought in as traitors. No?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. We were ready to graduate, and the last test of our allegiance was-- I'm getting ahead of myself. I went on a trip home and visited my parents and when I was there, in the middle of the night, I awoke and overhead them talking, and went to the stair and listened to them talk about revolution and tearing the Empire down, and I felt disgraced and shame for my family. My mother and my father, who were so wonderful to me when I was a child, and were so happy for me to go to the Academy and believe in the Empire

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You had to do this to graduate, to prove your loyalty.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, yeah, but it didn't exactly go according to that plan because as soon as I heard my mother and father screaming inside... I was so sure. I was so sure... until I wasn't, and I broke a bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you go in after them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I went to an asylum for a number of years. I broke. I don't remember so well what happened to me there. It was quite a number of years. Years later, a woman was there, and she, another patient, put hands on me, and she took the clouds away.
